meanings.definition: In the order of time or occurrence
meanings.sent1: She placed the books on the shelf ordinally, starting from left to right.
meanings.sent2: The students lined up ordinally according to their heights.
meanings.sent3: The clock ticked ordinally, marking each passing second with precision.
meanings.sent4: The leaves fell ordinally from the tree, dancing gracefully to the ground.
meanings.sent5: The waves crashed ordinally against the shore, creating a rhythmic melody.

meanings.definition: In the order of rank or importance
meanings.sent1: The ordinally numbered medals were displayed proudly on his chest.
meanings.sent2: She followed the ordinally arranged list of tasks diligently.
meanings.sent3: The ordinally colored belts in karate symbolize different levels of expertise.
meanings.sent4: His ordinally decorated uniform showed his high status in the organization.
meanings.sent5: The ordinally placed trophies gleamed under the bright lights of the showcase.

meanings.definition: In the order of a series
meanings.sent1: The ordinally stacked books formed a neat tower on the desk.
meanings.sent2: The ordinally labeled boxes made it easy to find the right documents.
meanings.sent3: The ordinally arranged flowers in the garden created a beautiful pattern.
meanings.sent4: The ordinally numbered pages of the book guided the reader through the story.
meanings.sent5: The ordinally organized files helped streamline the workflow in the office.
